long_description: A tough pair of panniers for everything from your daily commute to an extended tour, the weatherproof Novara Gotham Bike Panniers feature big-mouth openings for easy gear access. Zippered opening flap is held tightly closed when side buckles are cinched tight; loosening buckles still allows access to main zip opening. Made from PVC-free material, the polyurethane-coated nylon shields contents from light moisture and road grime. Riding through more than a light sprinkle? Deploy the integrated raincovers for complete weatherproof protection. Rixen & Kaul(R) Twist system simplifies attachment and removal with an intuitive clicking interface; fully adjustable system fits rack diameters from 8 - 12mm. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Internal compression straps prevent gear and clothes from shifting. Interior mesh pockets inside for storing small items. Novara Gotham Bike Panniers are sold as a pair.
